name: ai-markdone
description: AI-MarkDone: ChatGPT & Gemini enhancement - One-click Markdown copy, formatted preview, word count, perfect math formula support. Compatible with Typora/Obsidian.

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run postbuild
scripts.postbuild: cp manifest.json dist/ && mkdir -p dist/icons && cp public/icons/*.png dist/icons/ && mkdir -p dist/src/popup && cp src/popup/popup.html dist/src/popup/
